reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Improved synergies between the Secretariats of all conventions related to the conservation of cultural and natural heritage

description.narrative: As indicated in the Operational Guidelines, the World Heritage Committee, with the support of the Secretariat, will ensure appropriate coordination and information-sharing between the WH Convention and other conventions, programmes and international organizations related to the conservation of cultural and natural heritage. Such cooperation enables the Secretariat to participate in meetings with other Biodiversity-related (BLG) or Cultural (CCLG) Conventions.The coordination in the UN systems also aims at the development of joint pilot projects for a coordinated approach to the state of conservation or for the strengthening of management methods of World Heritage sites.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
